pages.text: $(li)The Ocean Monument is a huge structure that can be found in the deep of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Oceans$(/l) in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Inside, you can find $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/sponge)Sponges$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/guardian)Guardians$(/l) defending this place and a very strongest dangerous creatiure that you will have to defeat during this adventure known as the $(l:patchouli:bosses/rumor_elder_guardian)Elder Guardian$(/l).
$(li)When you are near of this structure, you will receive the Mining Fatigue III, making imposible to you to break any block.
